ValidationRule.description: Prevent the unchecking of a checked Do Not Delete field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( ISCHANGED( Do_Not_Delete__c ) ), ( Do_Not_Delete__c = FALSE), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"2008-09 Operations Administration"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck a checked Do Not Delete field. Please contact your Salesforce.com Business Unit Representative for assistance.
